groupdesc: Settings for the Event Calendar pages.

fields.name: tribe_show_subheader
fields.label: Display subheader on Event Calendar pages
fields.tooltip: You can enable/disable showing the subheader on Event Calendar pages

fields.name: tribe_pages_title
fields.label: Title for Event Calendar pages
fields.tooltip: Here you can set title which will be displayed on all Event Calendar pages.

fields.name: tribe_pages_subtitle
fields.label: Subtitle for Event Calendar pages
fields.tooltip: Here you can set subtitle which will be displayed on all Event Calendar pages.

fields.name: tribe_subheader_area_bgimage
fields.label: Subheader area image
fields.tooltip: Select the image for the subheader area on all Event Calendar pages.

fields.name: tribe_subheader_text_color
fields.label: Subheader text color
fields.tooltip: Select a default subheader text color on Events Calendar pages.
